primary.context: Caller wants to book or reserve their ownership week
primary.detail: Caller provided nonsensical response to name request and then disconnected.

steps: Caller requested to schedule a timeshare week
Caller provided a nonsensical response about shapes
Agent attempted to clarify the intent before caller disconnected

failure.detail: Caller provided a non-sequitur response about geometry when asked for their name.

clarifications.note: Agent re-verifying intent after nonsensical user input

actions.detail: Initial greeting suggests successful caller ID lookup

insights.summary: The caller wanted to schedule a timeshare week but gave a nonsensical response when asked for their name and disconnected shortly after.
insights.verbatim: Which state? Has three sides? Patricia. Star. A triangle, or square.
insights.coaching: The agent correctly attempted to clarify the intent after the confusing input, but the call was out of scope (reservations) and should have eventually been transferred.
